column4: Silly SSH question. If my ssh connection drops, does it close my running applications? Or does it orphan an SSH user session somewhere?
usually the kernel will send a SIGHUP to the processes associated with the terminal
and usually that will kill the processes

frostburn: joaopinto: belated thank you for your answers to my ssh question. I wanted it to close things out. I'd dropped a couple connections and wanted to make sure I didn't have things hanging open somewhere.
